appetizers.name: Artichoke Dip
appetizers.description: Lightly toasted tortilla chips with a smoothly blended Arti who has choked.

cold sandwiches.name: Iced Fish
cold sandwiches.description: Flash frozen fish drizzeld in a lemon icing served on full stock wheat buns - not for the brittle of teeth!

cold sandwiches.name: Caprese Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Fresh basile nestled between house made mozzerlla cheese and sunripend tomatoes, drizzled with blasamic vinager on fresh baked bread.

hot sandwiches.name: BLT
hot sandwiches.description: Warm slices of meat pressed under the orger rock lightly smeared with mayo served with chips and a pickle

hot sandwiches.name: Honey Fried
hot sandwiches.description: Handmade funnel cakes topped with slices of honey comb and candied ginger, drizzled with sweet icing.

desserts.name: Apple Pie
desserts.description: As American as Canada these green apples are carmalized in sugars before being putted in the bready stuff. Baked to perfection topped with more sugar whipped cream.

desserts.name: Chocolate Lave Cake
desserts.description: Warm chocolate cake filled with semi sweet chocolate pieces, heated to perfection with importated hawaiian lava - caution might be hot

drinks.name: Mead
drinks.description: House brewed in a hobbits home a sweet mead from honey and apples

drinks.name: Soda
drinks.description: You choose your syrup we add the ice and the carbinated water, you drink to enjoy
